text: The 1994 Pacific Curling Championships were held from December 6 to 8 at the Alpine Ice Sports Centre in Christchurch, New Zealand. Australia won the men's event over Japan (it was the fourth Pacific title for the Australian men). On the women's side, Japan defeated Australia in the final (it was the third Pacific title for the Japanese women). By virtue of winning, the Australian men's team and the Japanese women's team qualified for the 1995 World and Curling Championships in Brandon, Manitoba, Canada. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable" !
